trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>处理程序中指定的工具提示文本将显示事件，每当鼠标指针位于单元格和控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>属性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要显示工具提示当前状态或单元格的值来确定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或在鼠标指针进入单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多个单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果单元格已设置的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
